meanings: 실용회화-찬성 I quite agree with you.
실용회화-찬성 I agree with you one hundred percent.

vlive.korean: 여러분들 다 동감하시나요? 공감하시나요, 이 말에? Do you agree with this? 듣기 View video EXO : BAEKHYUN ONLINE FANMEETING 'CanDelight Shop'
노력도 재능이다! 저도 여기에 동감합니다 - 네, 노력도 재능이다! How much effort you can make is also a talent. I agree. - Right. The ability to make efforts! 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13 with RM #0613FM_0502
vlive.english: How much effort you can make is also a talent. I agree. - Right. The ability to make efforts!

vlive.korean: 언니도 동감 있지 않아요? Don't you kind of agree? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#148. 아이들 라디오 (w. (여자)아이들)
[스태프 모두 동감] 왜? 멋있는데! [All the staff agree] Why? It looks great! 듣기 View video INFINITE : 남우현(Nam Woo Hyun) “Hold On Me” Ep.2
vlive.english: [All the staff agree] Why? It looks great!

vlive.korean: 많이 동감하시죠? You all agree, right? 듣기 View video 키워드#보아 - my SMTelevision : [키워드#보아] 깜짝 라이브#3 팬사인회 가는 길~!

examples.korean: ‘Thank God that’s finished.’ ‘I’ll second that!’ 발음듣기 “그것이 끝나서 정말 기뻐.” “동감이야!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Thank God that’s finished.’ ‘I’ll second that!’ 발음

examples.korean: ‘It’s terrible.’ ‘I couldn’t agree more!’ 발음듣기 “끔찍해.” “전적으로 동감이야!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
I agree with you in that point. 발음듣기 그 점에서 나는 너와 동감이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I agree with you in that point. 발음

examples.korean: I agree with you; it's a good deal. 발음듣기 동감이에요. 정말 잘 사셨어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I agree with you; it's a good deal. 발음

examples.korean: We all agreed with what he said. 발음듣기 우리는 모두 그의 말에 동감했다 Neungyule
examples.english: We all agreed with what he said. 발음
